fees.description: Move In - Connection Fee,Includes GST. Fees may vary.
Move Out - Disconnection Fee,Includes GST. Fees may vary.
Reconnection Fee (Business Hours),Includes GST. Fees may vary.
A late payment fee may be charged when full payment has not been received by the bill due dat

electricityContract.terms: This offer applies to customers with an applicable network tariff. For full terms and conditions, visit our website at https://www.bluenrg.com.au/rates_and_pricing or contact Blue NRG on 1300 599 888.
electricityContract.variation: Rates may vary if a cost has or is expected to increase. It will reflect the increase and not exceed what we consider necessary. We may review and reset rates at our discretion with advance notice. For full terms and conditions, visit www.bluenrg.com.au.

eligibility.description: This product is only available to new customers.

demandCharges.description: Peak demand is the maximum of all 30 minute metered kW demand that occurred between 4pm and 8pm on business days in each month. This charge applies for the  period between 1 Nov- 31 Mar each year and is charged in $/kW/day in your billing period.

Peak demand is the maximum of all 30 minute metered kW demand that occurred between 4pm and 8pm on business days in each month. This charge applies for the  period between 1 Apr- 31 Oct each year and is charged in $/kW/day in your billing period.

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: Your contract is ongoing until it is ended by you or us.
electricityContract.additionalFeeInformation: For information on additional fees, visit our website at https://www.bluenrg.com.au/rates_and_pricing or contact Blue NRG on 1300 599 888.
